html: On my first day in Congress, I'm proud to lead the charge against this partisan lawsuit attacking Americans’ health care. We will not stand idly by while special interest forces and their allies in Washington look to rip away health care from millions of hard-working Americans.

html: The Maduro regime’s violent and criminal attacks on its own citizens must end. The United States, and every responsible global actor, must stand united in opposing Maduro and commit to ensuring free and fair elections in Venezuela. The Venezuelan people deserve no less.
text:
The Maduro regime’s violent and criminal attacks on its own citizens must end. 

The United States, and every responsible global actor, must stand united in opposing Maduro and commit to ensuring free and fair elections in Venezuela. The Venezuelan people deserve no less.

html: As a nation, we must reject all forms of hate and antisemitism. With the tragedy at the Chabad of Poway synagogue it’s important that our places of worship are safe. I’ve spoken with Mayor Rawlings, and Dallas Police are taking measures to ensure synagogues are safe and secure.
text:
As a nation, we must reject all forms of hate and antisemitism. With the tragedy at the Chabad of Poway synagogue it’s important that our places of worship are safe. 

I’ve spoken with Mayor Rawlings, and Dallas Police are taking measures to ensure synagogues are safe and secure.
